text: Innum unkalutaiya celvankalo, unkalutaiya makkalo (unkalukkut takuti kotuttu) unkalai nam'malavil nerunki vaikka kutiyavarkal allar. Anal evar iman kontu, salihana (nalla) amal ceykinraro attakaiyorkku, avarkal ceytatarku irattippu narkuli untu; melum avarkal (cuvanapatiyin) unnatamana malikaikalil nim'matiyutan irupparkal
